hadiths.text: Narrated 'Urwa bin Az-Zubair:I asked `Aisha (whether the Prophet (ﷺ) had performed `Umra in Rajab). She replied, "Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) never performed any `Umra in Rajab

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمِ اعْتَمَرَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: How many times did the Prophet (ﷺ) perform 'Umra ?
